sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the effect of laser combined with anal dilatation in the treatment of anal fissure.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲觀察激光加擴肛術治療肛裂的療效。

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effect of "Cupai Decoction"in the treatment of ovulatory dysfunction.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察促排卵湯對排卵功能障礙的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Psyllium offers benefits in patients with irritable bowel syndrome in primary care.
sentences.chinese: 歐車前在腸易激綜合徵患者的初級保健中療效最佳。

sentences.english: Conclusion GKC is effective in treating chronic bronchitis in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 結論固本咳喘膠囊治療老年慢性支氣管炎療效確切。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effects of laparoscope operation and spermatic veins operation in patients with spermophlebectasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察腹腔鏡與開放手術治療精索脈曲張的療效。

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To observe the therapeutic effects of transplantation of conjunctival flap for pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 觀察單純結膜瓣移植治療翼狀胬肉的療效。

sentences.english: Once school-related fears of children was diagnosed, the treatment that given early would achieve better effects.
sentences.chinese: 一旦確診兒童學校恐怖症，早期予以治療則療效較好。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the feasibility of wrapping a lacerated kidney with pedicled omental graft.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察腎臟裂傷後大網膜包腎修補方法的療效。

sentences.english: Effect of 1,6-fructose diphosphate in 119 cases of cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸果糖治療119例腦梗死患者的療效觀察。

sentences.english: Conclusion Atorvastatin is similar in curative effect and safety to Xuezhikang.
sentences.chinese: 結論血脂康與阿託伐他汀降脂療效與安全性相似。

sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結評估手術治療肱骨髁間骨折的療效。

sentences.english: Conclusion Moxibustion therapy is an effective method for acute gouty arthritis.
sentences.chinese: 結論中醫灸法治療痛風性關節炎急性期療效確切。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手術矯正小兒共同性內斜視的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the clinical effect of Seng-Yu decoction on Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價生玉湯治療2型糖尿病的臨牀療效。

definition: lit. to prescribe the right medicine for an illness (idiom); fig. to study a problem to find the right way to solve it/to take appropriate steps
to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
